title: The Rosary of Love
description: Reciting a rosary is an ancient act of spiritual devotion, this book presents the rosary of love to be recited in praise of love. It has one hundred and one love poems representing one hundred and one beads of a rosary. In this rosary, each poem has a different flavour, each poem has a different shade, and each poem leaves a different yet beautiful impression of love.
author: Ali  Ashraf
